name: Bede
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Big Charm

name: Crushing Hammer
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Retrieval
rules: Put up to 2 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Search
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Energy Switch
rules: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Evolution Incense
rules: Search your deck for an Evolution Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hop
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Hyper Potion
rules: Heal 120 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has at least 2 Energy attached. If you healed any damage in this way, discard 2 Energy from it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Lucky Egg
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

name: Lum Berry
rules: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, it recovers from all of them, and discard this card.

name: Marnie
rules: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Metal Saucer
rules: Attach a Metal Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Metal Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ordinary Rod

You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

rules: Shuffle up to 2 Supporter cards from your discard pile into your deck.

attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Dauntless Shield
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon VMAX.

attacks.name: Assault Tackle
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Swallow
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Falling Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Beak Catch
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Spit Shot
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 160 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Bede
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Marnie
rules: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Yell Grunt
rules: Put an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon into their hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

attacks.name: G-Max Pump
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Discharge
attacks.text: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stone Gift
attacks.text: Attach a Fighting Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, heal 120 damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: G-Max Fall
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Bede
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Marnie
rules: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Team Yell Grunt
rules: Put an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon into their hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Intrepid Sword
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and attach any number of Metal Energy cards you find there to this Pokémon. Put the other cards into your hand. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Brave Blade
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Dauntless Shield
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon VMAX.

attacks.name: Assault Tackle
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Air Balloon
rules: The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is ColorlessColorless less.

name: Metal Saucer
rules: Attach a Metal Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Metal Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ordinary Rod
rules: Choose 1 or both:• Shuffle up to 2 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck.• Shuffle up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Quick Ball
rules: You can play this card only if you discard another card from your hand.Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
